an9.3:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava calikayam viharati calikapabbate.
an9.3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma meghiyo bhagavato upatthako hoti.
an9.3:1.3: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.3:2.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya jantugamam pindaya pavisi.
an9.3:2.2: Jantugame pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena kimikalaya nadiya tiram tenupasankami.
an9.3:2.3: Addasa kho ayasma meghiyo kimikalaya nadiya tire janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano ambavanam pasadikam ramaniyam.
an9.3:2.5: “pasadikam vatidam ambavanam ramaniyam, alam vatidam kulaputtassa padhanatthikassa padhanaya.
an9.3:2.6: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, agaccheyyaham imam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
an9.3:3.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.3:4.1: “Idhaham, bhante, pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya jantugamam pindaya pavisim.
an9.3:4.2: Jantugame pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena kimikalaya nadiya tiram tenupasankamim.
an9.3:4.3: Addasam kho aham, bhante, kimikalaya nadiya tire janghaviharam anucankamamano anuvicaramano ambavanam pasadikam ramaniyam.
an9.3:4.7: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, agaccheyyaham imam ambavanam padhanaya’ti.
an9.3:4.8: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, gaccheyyaham tam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
an9.3:4.9: “Agamehi tava, meghiya. Ekakamhi tava yava annopi koci bhikkhu agacchati”ti.
an9.3:5.1: Dutiyampi kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.3:5.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kinci uttari karaniyam, natthi katassa paticayo.
an9.3:5.3: Mayham kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaniyam, atthi katassa paticayo.
an9.3:5.4: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, gaccheyyaham tam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
an9.3:5.5: “Agamehi tava, meghiya, ekakamhi tava yava annopi koci bhikkhu agacchati”ti.
an9.3:6.1: Tatiyampi kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.3:6.2: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kinci uttari karaniyam, natthi katassa paticayo.
an9.3:6.3: Mayham kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaniyam, atthi katassa paticayo.
an9.3:6.4: Sace mam bhagava anujaneyya, gaccheyyaham tam ambavanam padhanaya”ti.
an9.3:7.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva yena tam ambavanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam ambavanam ajjhogahetva annatarasmim rukkhamule divaviharam nisidi.
an9.3:7.2: Atha kho ayasmato meghiyassa tasmim ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo papaka akusala vitakka samudacaranti, seyyathidam—
an9.3:7.6: Saddhaya ca vatamha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita;
an9.3:7.7: atha ca panimehi tihi papakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvasatta—
an9.3:8.1: Atha kho ayasma meghiyo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma meghiyo bhagavantam etadavoca:
an9.3:9.1: “Idha mayham, bhante, tasmim ambavane viharantassa yebhuyyena tayo papaka akusala vitakka samudacaranti, seyyathidam—
an9.3:9.5: Saddhaya ca vatamha agarasma anagariyam pabbajita;
an9.3:9.6: atha ca panimehi tihi papakehi akusalehi vitakkehi anvasatta—
an9.3:10.1: “Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya panca dhamma paripakkaya samvattanti.
an9.3:10.3: Idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyanamitto hoti kalyanasahayo kalyanasampavanko.
an9.3:10.4: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam pathamo dhammo paripakkaya samvattati.
an9.3:11.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu silava hoti, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharati acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu.
an9.3:11.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam dutiyo dhammo paripakkaya samvattati.
an9.3:12.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya, seyyathidam—appicchakatha santutthikatha pavivekakatha asamsaggakatha viriyarambhakatha silakatha samadhikatha pannakatha vimuttikatha vimuttinanadassanakatha, evarupiya kathaya nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an9.3:12.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam tatiyo dhammo paripakkaya samvattati.
an9.3:13.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an9.3:13.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam catuttho dhammo paripakkaya samvattati.
an9.3:14.1: Puna caparam, meghiya, bhikkhu pannava hoti udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an9.3:14.2: Aparipakkaya, meghiya, cetovimuttiya ayam pancamo dhammo paripakkaya samvattati.
an9.3:15.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa:
an9.3:16.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa:
an9.3:16.2: ‘yayam katha abhisallekhika cetovivaranasappaya, seyyathidam—appicchakatha …pe… vimuttinanadassanakatha, evarupiya kathaya nikamalabhi bhavissati akicchalabhi akasiralabhi’.
an9.3:17.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa: ‘araddhaviriyo viharissati …pe… anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu’.
an9.3:18.1: Kalyanamittassetam, meghiya, bhikkhuno patikankham kalyanasahayassa kalyanasampavankassa: ‘pannava bhavissati …pe… sammadukkhakkhayagaminiya’.
an9.3:19.1: Tena ca pana, meghiya, bhikkhuna imesu pancasu dhammesu patitthaya cattaro dhamma uttari bhavetabba—
an9.3:19.2: asubha bhavetabba ragassa pahanaya, metta bhavetabba byapadassa pahanaya, anapanassati bhavetabba vitakkupacchedaya, aniccasanna bhavetabba asmimanasamugghataya.
an9.3:19.4: Anattasanni asmimanasamugghatam papunati dittheva dhamme nibbanan”ti.
